title: KitchenAid Blender - Model KSB560MC0
description:
5 (Five) Speeds: Stir, Chop, Mix, Puree, Liquefy
2 (Two) Functions: Pulse Mode, Crush Ice
Features:
720-Watt Peak Power Motor
Heavy plastic 56-ounce pitcher
Easy-Pour Spout Designed to Eliminate Drips
author: Harrison Douglass

questions.author: Bruce Wu
questions.body: What is the capacity of the blender?

answer.body: The blender can hold about 4 cups.

questions.author: Evan Huang
questions.body: Can I use this blender for hot food items?

questions.author: Laura Lourenco
questions.body: Is there storage for the cord?

answer.body: There is a channel underneath the blender that allows you to wrap about four inches of the cord in it.
